storyInfo: The road to the Grinning Valley is blocked by Originium formations, and the gang has no choice but to return empty-handed. Ray voluntarily joins Rhodes Island and tells the story of her encounter with the Feranmut when she was a child. However, Amiya glimpses the memory of somebody else from that story.

attributes.text: Doctor, I'm not afraid anymore.
They asked me a lot of questions, and I told them everything... Our long journey, the places we've been, and whether we had fun or not...
But there were a few questions that I found no answers to.
Is the Doctor looking for something? Why did they all say behind our backs that the things that the Doctor wants to see can't ever be seen again?
Why did the Doctor save me and travel with me?

attributes.content: All drivers, ears—both long and short—up, this is guidance for our departure in six hours.
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: Watch the Catastrophe forecasts and drive safe. Don't chase wildlife. Let's get the trucks in and get home early...
attributes.name: PA Announcement

attributes.content: Well, you don't look so bad, old bones.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You should be thankful your last trip is with me. Others probably wouldn't have what it takes to get you fixed.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You'd have to sit out there in the boonies in tatters with that hole the anti-armor blew open, and wait for the engineering team to come to take you apart and haul any usable modules back to the factory for reassembly.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: And me? I wouldn't be able to hand in the truck. The whole thing would've been a bust. Everyone would be making fun of me for that the rest of my life.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I should've been made fun of the rest of my life. If someone found I was hiding underneath the truck when she was killed...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Ugh, that kinda thing's not ever gonna happen again.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Alright, just one more problem, then. I don't have too many mates in Iron Carrot City. I need to find someone to teach me how to write the accident report...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Oi, stop ringing the bell. This truck's not going anywhere. You got the wrong—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: —Coward?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Uh... Hehe. Looks like I got the right one.
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: The gaudy decorations are all gone, and it doesn't look like a war broke out in here anymore. Feels a bit strange, actually...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Anyway, it's good seeing this thing in one piece! This has to mean that Ray and Warmy are both fine, right?
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Hah, suppose so.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Th-Then, let me ask one other thing...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Did Ray find the thing she said she was looking for?
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I'm really sorry! I didn't mean to bring up painful memories like that!
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It's not really painful for me at all.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: That said, the hijacker doesn't think it's all that painful for her, either.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Come to think of it, this really doesn't make any bloody sense... She disappeared halfway through the trip for no reason, then she showed up where we pulled over to wait for a small Catastrophe to pass.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: She's just like a dumb fowlbeast who finds herself disoriented after getting carried a thousand miles away by a Catastrophe wind.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Uh, then... she didn't possibly forget what she's looking for, right? I know there are folks who would run in circles as a kind of contest, and there was this lad who got so dizzy that he fell and knocked his brains out...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: We might have a worse case on our hands. She told me she met a Feranmut.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: And she said it's not the one she's looking for.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Finally, she even said the Feranmut has already told her the thing she's looking for doesn't exist.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I... I feel kinda sorry for her.
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Really now? I call that finally seeing things clearly.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But after that, we did keep heading to the Grinning Valley. We went through all the trouble to make our way there. No way I was going to turn back on our hijacking.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Then? How was it?
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: So cool...! Too bad it's pretty dangerous there. A coward like you? You won't be seeing it in your lifetime, haha!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Really, I don't suggest you go. If it wasn't for my technique and quick reflexes, the ute would still be stuck in that valley.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: On our journey back, we had to stop every two hours for the old bones to cool down... The union says it's about time it gets 'standardized.' And well, they have a point.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: *sigh*, it's been twenty years.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You... You've been driving for twenty years? I never would've guessed...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Well, thanks for the vote of confidence in my skills.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: But I was going to say... I've known this old girl for twenty years.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Right, Coward—Where's my invitation to your wedding?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Huh? Uh...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Um... You might've missed the wedding...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: *cough*... Actually, I'm on my honeymoon.
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: And... well, that's over now. As of ten minutes ago.
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Iron Carrot City was going to be our final stop, but I saw your transport when we got to the gates, and all of a sudden, I started to think... I wanted the trip to last a little longer.
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Oh... Are you two driving that truckie parked not too far up ahead? Here I thought the driver got on the wrong level instead of the logistics channel for their delivery.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Something's off, though...
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Haha, we're driving a delivery truck alright...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Actually, we found her truck when we left the gateway that day. We were thinking of turning back to our engagement ceremony... then somehow, we drove to the registration center instead...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Then, we drove to the open plaza, had our ceremony, and went on our honeymoon...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Bugger me dead, now I remember!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Wh-Wh-What is it...?!
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: The girl that followed you everywhere. Now I remember where I saw her face! It's the logo on this truck! This face!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I knew there was a hardware store that sold old safety valves!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Oh, right, she was trying to make herself disappear...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Do you even know why we had to stop every now and then?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: I-I-I'm really sorry! Let me apologize sincerely on her behalf...
attributes.name: Jerry

attributes.content: Uh, I'm just kidding. I can't really blame you for this one. This truck should've been upgraded a long time ago.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: That being said, if we get this last part installed right now, I can get away with a dozen fewer sentences on the report.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Quick, do you have any of the valves in stock on your transport?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Warmy, is it ready yet?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: It... It's still sparking...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: ...I'll learn how to use it in a bit. Give me a little more time! Once I learn how to use this staff, I'll come out of the room!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: If you really can't figure out how to use it, you're free to ask that old Caster there again.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But I learned so fast both when Lanns taught me how to fix cars and when Daddy taught me how to cook...!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I thought you'd follow Alanna to get the truck returned.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I couldn't. Didn't you say you had to finish some other work by noon today to get on that big mining ship of yours?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Aww, I could've taken my bike, and I could've given you two a ride to the next stop, too.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Thanks, Savage.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: But I have to leave at some point.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Whoa—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Whoa, why did you lean on the door?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Well, simply put, as a security officer, you sometimes gotta block the door and scare people. I got used to doing it...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Why is the breeze so warm...?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hehe, I'm starting to get a handle on how to use the staff!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: You really figured it out? That's incredible!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But let's put an end to your little show here. If you keep heating the air, I'm going to catch fire.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Let's sit here and wait for Alanna. Once she's back, I'll take you two to the Rhodes Island landship and see what they can do about your Oripathy.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: It feels so familiar sitting on the seat, waiting for somebody.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: The benches in the waiting area are made of steel. They're so cold, and I couldn't get them warm, no matter what.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: If only I knew how to use Arts before, I could've warmed the benches without anyone knowing, and Daddy's bones wouldn't have hurt so much.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: You'll get the chance, Warmy... You still have lots of time to learn how to use your staff before you find your daddy.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: By then, you'll be able to control your power how you want it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Really...?
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: But Ray didn't find the Feranmut in the end, and we didn't really make it to the Grinning Valley.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: But I've been waiting for Daddy for so long... After everything, I should...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: ...This trip was so, so long.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Phew, finally made it. I really gotta hand it to that coward. He's really got a knack for writing reports.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: —My, that staff is so pretty. Really gotta hand it to me!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: How is it, Potlid? You all ready?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns! Take a look at this! Here!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Okay—
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: This is way too hot, all of a sudden!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Savage, is it really okay for her to use Arts like that?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Hm? Yeah, it's fine.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Well, alright then. Heh, I've had my eyes on this staff for a long time, it just screams Billy industrial aesthetic. I knew it'd be a great fit for our Potlid!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: How's that? Now bring on the praises.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: You're so amazing, Lanns!
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: So... amazing.
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: It's just, even if I'd got it for you a long time ago, we didn't have anyone around to teach you how to use it. Besides, I couldn't just put 'the transport truck' down for our delivery address, right?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Now then, let's go get you treated.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: When you see your old man again, we'll let him see a real healthy Potlid with incredible Arts!
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Lanns, I...
attributes.name: Potlid

attributes.content: Huh? Why are you...?
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: ...Alright, let it out.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Just grab my clothes and cry. I don't mind.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: At the very least, you didn't end this journey empty-handed.
attributes.name: Alanna

attributes.content: Verify the pre-departure supplies order. Get the Originium fuel item deleted. We have more than enough fuel reserves. Hell, we have so much, they could come spilling out the tank.
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.content: What about these orders from individual operators...? Who commissioned a Messenger to send all these carrots, again?! I've had it with that sweet smell in the kitchen! I can't take it anymore!
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.content: This crate's the refined solvent that Engineering ordered. This one is the materials for the experiment Closure is putting together for a new line of business. Hello, Amiya. Hello, Doctor. This one...
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.content: Huh? Amiya? Doctor? What are you two doing here?
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry. Are we interrupting the Procurement Department's work...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, it's fine. It's just... If you're here for the view, I think you'll have a better time up on the deck. It's pretty noisy here at the logistics channel.
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.content: Oh, actually, we've kind of got used to noisy environments lately. This noise here actually feels more comfortable...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, let's head further inside.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: How did your checkup go, Amiya?

attributes.content: Don't worry. No changes in my vitals.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After all, we kept our distance from the Active Originium clusters, and we had effective protective measures.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... I'd be lying to say I wasn't terrified to see... Active Originium growing and fragmenting the earth in front of me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It's very Rim Billiton to name that place the 'Grinning Valley'.

attributes.content: But when I hear that name now, I don't think I can smile anymore...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... maybe when everyone gave it the name 'Grinning Valley', it was just a natural valley that wasn't yet covered in Active Originium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ray was so sure that she had been there when she was young, after all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But over those ten years, the Originium there rapidly proliferated and made the area unrecognizable. Not even Ray could identify it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Do you think it's a shame?;Are you scared?

attributes.content: Yeah, we didn't actually make it to the Grinning Valley. All we did was look at it from afar before we had to turn back. It feels...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It feels kinda like... getting ready for a picnic, only for it to rain that day.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Don't laugh, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah, if we hadn't by chance approached the Grinning Valley from higher ground and the visibility was any lower... perhaps the Originium clusters would've caught up to us, or maybe we would've fumbled our way into it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sometimes, I think that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...perhaps they grow and proliferate in the bodies of the Infected just like that. All the Infected across the lands were actually caught by the Originium a long time ago..
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you think the Feranmut that Ray was looking for... really exists?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: As far as I know, Feranmuts do exist.;There's a reason she managed to escape that minor Catastrophe.

attributes.content: That's good, then...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Although we didn't make it to our destination, Ray wasn't just suffering a nightmare.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, here's your order.
attributes.name: Procurement Operator

attributes.options: My order?;I don't remember placing an order through Rhodes Island lately.

attributes.content: Oh, it's a surprise I ordered for you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uh, it's a small vivarium...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I walked by the market that day, it suddenly occurred to me that you seemed very interested in Billy fauna all those years ago.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When you brought me back to this landship and turned to look at the wilderness... You seemed very lonely. I was still small, but I could tell that it was loneliness.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So I thought I wanted to miniaturize and save everything there is in Rim Billiton as a snapshot for you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At the very least, back then, I thought you felt lonely because the landship was a bit empty. Perhaps having some living things around would make you happier.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course, Rhodes Island has a botanical garden now, and our databases have a sizable collection of ecological files, so this small vivarium might not be all that useful to you anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I still wanted to fulfill the wish I had as a kid.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: The way I was then, is it more or less the way you are now?

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: P-Pretty different...? I'm not lonely at all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just, after we got back here, I suddenly started to feel sad.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have to get back to preparing for our journey to Victoria.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Combat, healing, disaster prevention, and saving lives.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Many elite operators have matters to settle, and... Dr. Kal'tsit forbade me from using that title to refer to myself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's something someone once told me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This path isn't one to reach the end by oneself, and it's not trodden for an outcome or an answer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I am here.;......;It's not like you to be so pessimistic.

attributes.content: Oh, please don't worry, Doctor. I'm fine. I'm not trying to act sentimental.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But maybe it's precisely because this path doesn't have an end that we sometimes want to take somebody's hand or reach our hand out to somebody else.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As such, life is finite, and life goes on.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Come, Doctor. Let me help you get your vivarium to your office. I've had enough time to put my feelings in order. Right now, there are still a lot of things I need to figure out and learn.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also, we just had a new operator pass her assessment. I want to go congratulate her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Based on her question for me, though... Rhodes Island doesn't actually need a pitsinker.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Sniffs)
attributes.name: Sandbeast

attributes.options: The critter staring at the vivarium... Is that Ray's sandbeast?

attributes.content: Yep, the one she's been holding onto since that Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hold on, the musbeast in the vivarium. Isn't that what sandbeasts like to eat?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Come back, Sandbeast. No eating the Doctor's things...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: ...Hello, Amiya, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Hello, Ray. I heard your assessment went very well. Congratulations.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I have a Rhodes Island ID badge now.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: And there's a number on it.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Yes, Ray. Are you worried about something?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: When the miners went in the shafts, they'd all bring their ID badges. That way, if somebody didn't come back, it's easy to figure out who.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But pitsinkers are temporary workers. We don't get ID numbers or badges.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I like this badge very much. Thanks.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Uh, no need to thank us...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's what a corporation should do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...If it pleases you, Rhodes Island can be your home, from here on out.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You see Ray lift her head to stare at Amiya all of a sudden.
Just like the stare that Amiya felt a few days ago, when you two walked by her on the street.
Right, Ray, why did you suddenly want to come to Rhodes Island... to be a pitsinker?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You helped Potlid.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I thought... I should've helped her too. I can't forget what happened that day, no matter what.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: And also...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I want an answer.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: When the Feranmut woke up from its centuries-long sleep and asked me what exactly I wanted... all I asked was for him to send me and the sandbeasts to a safe place.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: At that moment, I felt no regrets about anything. As if being able to see it was more than enough.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But I still want to know why I so longed for that light at the time. What exactly is it to me?
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: 'At the time'? Ray, you mean...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Ray? Are you asking me? Why?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You quickly realize that Ray is not looking at Amiya. Not at all.
The Feranmut. My hallucination. Over ten years ago, I saw it in the Grinning Valley.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: At the time, I was with a team of hunters. There was a sandstorm. It was dark, and we got lost.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I was still pretty short, so I could only see the people around me and their hunting crossbows. After some time, I couldn't walk anymore, and I couldn't see anything clearly.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: In the end, all I remember seeing was a huge shadow.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: And... a ray of pure, white light. It was narrow, but it penetrated the sands.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: I heard a gentle whisper that drowned the howling winds.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: All of a sudden, I wasn't afraid anymore.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Maybe it was just a dream that I had. The only thing I remember after it was waking up in a tent I'd never seen before.
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: But even if it was just a dream, I want to see the hallucination that has been with me all this time...
attributes.name: Ray

attributes.content: Doctor, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry. Just now, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I saw it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I saw a Rhodes Island that was freshly dug out and covered by a canvas.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Its large shadow moved slowly through an Originium-covered wilderness in Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz engineering team all had their faces covered to conceal their identities. Their vehicle was loaded with cannons, while architectural Arts forged blades.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The sandstorm was fierce, and the road ahead was dark. A long convoy followed Rhodes Island's tracks and marched onwards.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is going to be a long, long road.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But... to save everyone from their hardships and to prevent an even crueler future, this is our greatest hope.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In the sands... the engineering team and a local team of hunters walked past each other...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw... her helping the trapped hunters, even though they were complete strangers...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Whose eyes... did you see all that through?

attributes.content: 'Because I think it would be so nice if everyone could make it back to their own home.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Right, Amiya. This landship has its own name. What's more, there's someone here who knows the meaning that was bestowed upon this 'Rhodes Island' when it was given this name.
Have you asked the Doctor? No, it's not because you're young that the Doctor didn't explain it to you.
The Doctor simply thought it should be us and those who come after us to define what kind of ship Rhodes Island is. It's fine if the old definition gets left behind in the past.
...At the very least, I think that line of thinking can at least partially be found in the Doctor's silence.
Because that is also how the Doctor sees the Doctor.
Knowledge cannot define the 'Doctor.' The Doctor thinks that the Doctor knows nothing. Memories cannot define the 'Doctor' either. The Doctor's memories could never again be found across these lands.
Amiya, do you trust the Doctor?
Right, I do too, and one of the reasons I chose to trust the Doctor is because the Doctor reached a hand out to you back then.

War, perseverance, civilization, hope. The extraordinarily long stretch of time, the burning stars, and the fated future. There are many, many thoughts so heavy they are unrecognizable within the Doctor's mind.
But the Doctor made a very simple wish.
The very first coordinates that the Doctor picked out of that vast loneliness.
Amiya, this is your home. Perhaps one day, it will be you who will decide what 'Rhodes Island' means.
Right, it's only natural to feel scared. Ah, this may be very hard, but I really do hope that you won't fear giving the wrong response.
Don't be afraid. The idealistic path is unending. That's why it can't be walked all the way to the end by any one person.
No matter when, and no matter why, if you're scared, you just need to find the people you trust and take their hands.
Huh? You're scared already? In that case, you can take my hand right now.
Until that day...

attributes.content: ...Doctor, can I do this?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you trust me?
attributes.name: Amiya
